ygData.subject: RE: Timorous Deep Question
ygData.msgSnippet: I have the pleasure of one of the iscar masks - its a lot of fun ) It is dropped by a level 49 wandering Wizard called Harbinger Dronik in Trakanon s Teeth. I
ygData.messageBody:
I have the pleasure of one of the iscar masks - its a lot of fun )

It is dropped by a level 49 wandering Wizard called Harbinger Dronik in
Trakanon's Teeth.

I have spent a fair amout of time in that zone and only seen him once, I was
out pulling hunters and foragers when he suprised me. I was dead in seconds,
luckily my group killed him and ressed me for the mask ).

I don't know if he is a triggered spawn or just really rare.

I am really interested in the Erudite mask too, roumer says it comes from
the Howling Stones but I would appreciate confirmation on that.

PS Thanks for all the raid advice. I ended up helping organise a Hate raid
which was great fun, I even got some Imbrued Gloves.

Bruen Bladesong
Citizen of the Avengers Federation
Bard of 48 songs
Erollisi Marr

--------------------------------------------
Subject: RE: Timorous Deep Question

speaking of masks, where can we get that mask? what lev the mob and what
zone? and i heard rumor of a erudite mask? sorry i been out of the loop and
trying to get back in it

-Minkin
Sol Ro
